name: learning_outcome_result_updated
definition: The event is emitted anytime a existing outcome rating for a submission is updated. Only changes to the fields included in the body of the event payload will emit the `updated` event.
trigger: Triggered when a submission outcome rating is updated.

schema.assessed_at: The date when the outcome was last assessed.
schema.created_at: Time when the result was created.
schema.learning_outcome_id: The local Canvas ID of the learning outcome.
schema.original_mastery: True if student achieved mastery on the first attempt.
schema.original_possible: Possible points on the first attempt.
schema.percent: Percent of maximum points possible for an outcome, scaled to reflect any custom mastery levels that differ from the learning outcome.
schema.title: Title of the learning outcome.
schema.updated_at: Time the learning outcome result was updated at.
